description: Decrease ignition timing advance if knock is detected

Increases a value in the Knock Autoadaptation table if knock is detected at a certain RPM and load (MAP). A value of 0% means that the values won't be changed, a value of 100% means that the values will be increased by 1 each knock event
Maximum ammount the ECU is allowed to retard timing when knock is detected (Does NOT apply to Knock Autoadaptation)
